com.hf.fundamental.dao

Interface IdentityDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DerbyIdentityDAO, SQLIdentityDAO, XMLIdentityDAO

    public interface IdentityDAO

    The IdentityDAO interface allows to define reusable behaviors for DAOs

    A DAO or Data Access Object is an entity responsible of data access (write or retrieve data) for a given object.

    This Data Access Object is responsible for accessing the Identity class.

    Author:
    Hoang / Favio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • create

        void create(Identity identity)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Write an Identity object to storage.

        Writes Identity data and extended attributes to disk. When JDBC is used as DAO, full extended attribute persistent storage is available in JSON Format.

        Parameters:
        identity - Identity Object send from the view layer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws Exception

      • readAll

        java.util.List<Identity> readAll()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads all identities from storage.

        Reads the identities from storage into a linked list to avoid reading from storage multiple times.

        Returns:
        List A list of identities.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - In case of data access exceptions.

      • search

        java.util.List<Identity> search(Identity identity)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads the list of Identities from the storage that match criteria

        Method receives an Identity object and after returns the identity list to which the object's fields match according to the criteria.

        Parameters:
        identity - criteria to search
        Returns:
        a List containing all the matches
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • modify

        void modify(Identity identity)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Update an Identity object from storage.

        Parameters:
        identity - Identity Object send by the view layer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - In case of data access exceptions

      • delete

        void delete(Identity identity)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete an Identity object from storage.

        Parameters:
        identity - object send by the view layer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - In case of data access exceptions.
